brief_description: Inbred C57BL/6 female mice (8-10 weeks old) were immunized subcutaneously according to the 8 immunization groups.  Serum samples were collected weekly from 2 staggered groups and analyzed for PA-specific (Total Ig, IgG1, IgG2a, and IgG3) and neutralizing antibody titers.  Also, spleen, thymus, and brachial and inguinal lymph nodes will be harvested from 1 of each group at 4 time points for histology.
brief_title: Determining the effect of different adjuvants and doses on the immune response
condition_studied: different adjuvants and doses on the immune response to rPA
description: Inbred C57BL/6 female mice (8-10 weeks old) were immunized subcutaneously according to the 8 immunization groups.  Serum samples were collected weekly from 2 staggered groups and analyzed for PA-specific (Total Ig, IgG1, IgG2a, and IgG3) and neutralizing antibody titers.  Also, spleen, thymus, and brachial and inguinal lymph nodes will be harvested from 1 of each group at 4 time points for histology.
endpoints: Mice were sacrificed at designated time points. ELISA and Immunohistochemistry assays were done on samples collected from the mice.
objectives: To determine the effect of different adjuvants and doses on the immune response.
official_title: Determining the effect of different adjuvants and doses on the immune response
